Other countries make fun of the usa for being so fat, but can you exactly blame us?  Walking into a grocery store or a gas station and passing by the candy section is like walking into willy wonka's factory.  The walmart in the next city over has ten aisles to candy.

Come with me and you'll be
In a world of pure imagination
Take a look and you'll see
Into your imagination

We'll begin with a spin
Trav'ling in the world of my creation
What we'll see will defy
Explanation
